## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
python3 -c 'input()'
^C
```

## Expected behavior

```none
The `python3.exe` should quit, and I should see the shell prompt.
```

## Actual behavior

```none
While using `conhost.exe`, it works normally.
But while using Windows Terminal (Preview 1.7.572.0) or Alacritty (0.7.2), The whole PowerShell stopped.
```
